title: GridPP3 Tier 2
abstractText: This grant is for equipment only, and has been agreed related to the previously agreed grant PP/E0027CX/1
impactText: Data analysis for the LHC and discovery of the Higgs Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software),Culture, Heritage, Museums and Collections Cultural
findingsText: Successful coupling together of many computers (&quot;The Grid&quot;) Further combination of computers (&quot;The cloud&quot;) Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software)
